sayHardThing.title: Say the hard thing
sayHardThing.description: Practice communicating difficult feelings or symptoms to your doctor

steps.goal: Describe the situation calmly and specifically
Explain how it affects your daily life
Ask for help or advice on next steps

adjustMedication.title: Ask to adjust medication
adjustMedication.description: Discuss medication changes with your healthcare provider

steps.goal: Describe current side effects or effectiveness
Explain what you hope to achieve with the change
Ask about alternatives and next steps

makeMostOf12Min.title: Make the most of 12 minutes
makeMostOf12Min.description: Maximize your time in a short doctor visit

steps.goal: Prioritize your three most important questions
